list.q: Whether the fund can accept Commitments from Joint Investors?
list.a: Yes, the fund can accept Commitments from Joint Ventures.

list.q: Who are the eligible persons for the purpose of Joint Investors?
list.a:
The following can act as Joint Investors:

An Investor and his/her spouse, who is also an eligible person

An Investor and his/her parent, who is also an eligible person

An Investor and his/her daughter/son, who is also an eligible person
